Title: Requires certain uses of class B multiple dwelling to undergo a petition and public hearing process with the relevant community board
Summary: Requires operation of class B multiple dwelling that rents or leases units for a period of less than twelve hours located on or within two-hundred-fifty feet of a parcel of land zoned for residential to undergo a petition and public hearing process with the relevant community board.
ActClause: AN ACT to require certain uses of class B multiple dwelling to undergo a petition and public hearing process with the relevant community board
